description: The move comes after a referendum that separatists say showed an overwhelming number of people want to split from Ukraine and join Russia.
title: Ukraine Separatists Dismantle Barricades in Eastern City of Mariupol
title_page: Ukraine Separatists Dismantle Barricades in Eastern City of Mariupol
text:
Breaking News Emails Get breaking news alerts and special reports. The news and stories that matter, delivered weekday mornings.
Pro-Russian separatists in eastern Ukraine began taking down barricades Tuesday in an apparent easing of the deadly tensions seen in recent weeks.
The armed groups who have occupied government buildings across the Donetsk and Luhansk regions began dismantling their positions in the southern city of Mariupol after a referendum Sunday that they claim returned an overwhelming vote to join Russia.
